meanings.definition: A tool used to drive nails below the surface of a material.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used a nailset to sink the nail into the wood.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to use a nailset when you want the nail to be flush with the surface.
meanings.sent3: The nailset was like a magic wand, making the nails disappear into the wood.
meanings.sent4: With the precision of a surgeon, the nailset gently tapped the nail out of sight.
meanings.sent5: The nailset whispered as it coaxed the nail beneath the surface, leaving no trace.

meanings.definition: To use a nailset to sink nails.
meanings.sent1: She carefully nailset the nails into the wall to hang the picture.
meanings.sent2: Remember to nailset the nails to avoid any protrusions.
meanings.sent3: He nailsets nails like a pro, making it look effortless.
meanings.sent4: The hammer strikes, but the nailset is the true artist in hiding the nails.
meanings.sent5: Nailsetting requires patience and precision to achieve a professional finish.
